title: David Copperfield
creator_credit: BBC, Kate Harwood and Simon Curtis
brief_description: Charles Dicken’s classic tale of the boy whose life is changed irrevocable when his mother marries the cruel Mr Murdstone, only to die and leave her son in his sinister clutches is brought to life in this BBC production which includes a stellar cast of Bob Hoskins, Maggie Smith, Betsey Trotwood, Trevor Eve, Nicholas Lyndhurst, Pauline Quirke, Ian Holm and Ciaran McMenamin as David.
